name: Pixel Climber (IsaacGames)
description:
Made for TweetTweetJam3, this game uses 551 characters of code and that's it.

You can move with the arrow keys, build with Z, and destroy with X. Your goal is to make it to the top of the screen.

When you press Z, the pixel you are on will be set as solid and you will restart at the bottom. X will delete the pixels touching you.

Build a staircase, a tower, a mountain, whatever you want to get to the top.

Enjoy!
